programme.title: Building Giants S3
programme.desc: See the race to build the world's next generation of engineering wonders in this award-winning series.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S1
programme.desc: The last four teams compete to create an impressive three-tiered cake, while also performing a spectacular piece of gourmet theatre known as live plating.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1
programme.desc: Hugely popular, Railway Journeys takes the simple premise of a journey by train, and transforms it into fascinating programmes exploring social history and landmark moments all over the world, brought to viewers by much-loved presenter Michael Portillo. With a 1913 Bradshaw's Handbook, published at the height of European Imperialism, to guide us, we join Michael on breathtaking train journeys through Hong Kong, Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Singapore.

programme.title: 5 Gold Rings S3
programme.desc: In 5 Gold Rings, every pixel counts! Phillip Schofield hosts the quiz show in which two teams use gold rings on an interactive LED floor to answer a sequence of pictorial questions.

programme.title: Blue Planet Now
programme.desc: Travel to the far corners of the planet and discover the secrets of Earth's few remaining untouched lands, all brimming with life. From the Namib Desert to Patagonia, only a handful of places on Earth can claim to be largely unchanged. Isolated from the rest of the world, these places have been protected from the most damaging effects of human interference. Delicately balanced, species-rich, unique ecosystems. In these lands, life exists as nature intended.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Turbo [S3]
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Two years after the International Blader's Cup, the story focuses on Aiger Akabane, a wild child that grew up in nature. After battling Valt Aoi the No.1 Blader, Aiger became inspired to become the No.1 Blader in the world.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: Mr. Banana Tree is feeling lonely. He's always stuck in the ground and unable to go places. Paula and her friends come up with a plan to cure Mr. Banana Tree's loneliness. Will they succeed? Tim is convinced he's a great handyman. His abilities are put the test when he's called upon to cover for Mr. Mechanic who is away on vacation. Will Tim live up to his self proclaimed name, Mr. Quick Fix?

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force follows the thrilling, fast-paced exploits of five mighty animal heroes as they serve and protect the citizens of five unique animal kingdoms. Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech. Whatever the problem, big or small, these heroes come together to work as one - Kingdom Force Unite!

programme.title: The School Bell Rings S3
programme.desc: The gang, at Mr. Jeevan's behest, is tasked to make a video for SG50. Haziq's ego causes the production to go off the rails, especially when he finds out he will be working with a famous director. Meanwhile, Jamie and Taylor lock horns over what to do about an unethical text message that has been sent to the latter's phone.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Food Fight
programme.desc: (Encore) 'Bak Kut Teh' - a Singaporean or Malaysian creation? On the Red Dot investigates the claims and resolves the nagging questions over where the dish was first created once and for all.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: After getting Amir to babysit Rayyan, Sulaiman gets upset when he couldn't contact Amir after that boy has forgotten to bring his phone. Shruti is still reeling from the kiss with Eddie and she avoids him at all cost. While Pam starts to recruit team members after taking up the Ninja Race challenge from Julius and the boys.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Master builder Tommy Walsh, together with expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards help real people make real home improvements, whatever the budget. Get smart, practical tips on home improvements that make your space work better for you.

programme.title: Luca's Key Ingredient S2
programme.desc: An exciting seven-part cooking show where Italian born Chef Luca Ciano will take your taste buds on a journey showcasing some exceptional Italian and Australian produce. He will share some insights on some key ingredient history and plate up meals that will leave you feeling true Italian love on a plate. Luca's lovable personality connects his joy of cooking with his remarkable journey over the years.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S1
programme.desc: A junior doctor, Ruby Walker (Amrita Acharia, Game of Thrones) arrives in India looking for a job and a distraction from her heartbreak. She anticipates the sunshine and picture-perfect beaches. She's even prepared for the tuk-tuks and the Delhi-belly that everyone warned her about. What she doesn't expect are the realities of work, life and even love at an underresourced and over-worked cottage hospital.

programme.title: 寻医
programme.desc: 在印度，住在大城市的30%人口，垂手即可享有全国高达75%的医疗资源。董姿彦前往海拔2300米的大吉岭山区，去了解住在交通不便的山村乡民们面对基本医疗需求，还有紧急医疗救助时，他们该向谁求助.

programme.title: 婉通夫人

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: 位於屏東縣的三地門鄉，是主要以排灣族為居民的地區。該地區因為幾名藝術家集文化園區的影響，在地有關族群藝術產業的發展非常興盛，可以說是台灣原住民的藝術之鄉，尤其以三地村最具代表性。工藝精湛的陶壺藝術、將排灣族傳統文化融入並發展成現代舞蹈藝術的蒂摩爾古薪舞集藝術團隊都是代表性的成員之一。近年造成風潮的山川琉璃吊橋、以排灣族琉璃珠藝術集神話的概念橫跨在隘寮溪的白色吊橋，更是負擔起帶動周邊旅遊產業的重要建設之一。再往深山一點的三地門鄉德文部落，一直以其咖啡產業較具代表性，海拔約800公尺的德文部落的得萊公園，是高.

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: (重) 位於屏東縣的三地門鄉，是主要以排灣族為居民的地區。該地區因為幾名藝術家集文化園區的影響，在地有關族群藝術產業的發展非常興盛，可以說是台灣原住民的藝術之鄉，尤其以三地村最具代表性。工藝精湛的陶壺藝術、將排灣族傳統文化融入並發展成現代舞蹈藝術的蒂摩爾古薪舞集藝術團隊都是代表性的成員之一。近年造成風潮的山川琉璃吊橋、以排灣族琉璃珠藝術集神話的概念橫跨在隘寮溪的白色吊橋，更是負擔起帶動周邊旅遊產業的重要建設之一。再往深山一點的三地門鄉德文部落，一直以其咖啡產業較具代表性，海拔約800公尺的德文部落的得萊公.
